entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
